Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <Acura360> Forwarded from Acura360: Komodo is pleased to announce that a major¬†ecosystem update will be activated on December 20 at block height 1,670,000. The update to version 0.5.0 of the Komodo software is mandatory for all exchanges, miners, and other individuals running a full node.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [telegram] <Acura360> Komodo is looking for two new developers: a frontend developer¬†and UX/UI designer with at least 3 years of experience; and a blockchain core developer with at least 5 years of experience with C/C++ and at least 2 years of experience with either the BTC or the ZEC protocol. Learn more on the¬†Komodo Careers page.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[telegram] <Mixic> Friendly reminder that we will upgrade the Komodo code base to version 0.5.0, dubbed Obsidian Dragon on December 20, 2019, at block height 1670000.
As a precaution, we have also advised all services and Exchanges to pause the deposits and withdrawals from Dec. 19th - 21st, 2019.
This is a mandatory platform upgrade, so all miners, exchanges, and individuals running full-seed nodes must update to the latest software before block 1670000. Those who do not update before December 20 will not run on the correct network.
All ecosystem Smart Chains (asset chains) will upgrade on Friday, December 20, 2019 11:06:40 AM UTC (timestamp: 1576840000)
Wallets:
Komodo OceanQT: 
https://github.com/DeckerSU/KomodoOcean/releases/tag/v3.0.0-beta1-9979ca2
Komodod (core daemon): 
https://github.com/KomodoPlatform/komodo/releases/tag/0.5.0
Verus Agama: 
https://github.com/VerusCoin/Agama/releases/tag/v0.6.0-1
Details about the Obsidian Dragon update
https://komodoplatform.com/komodo-to-activate-platform-wide-update/?utm_source=Komodo+Main+Newsletter&utm_campaign=5959f75965-EMAIL_CAMPAIGN_Newsletter_2019_Dec_13&utm_medium=email&utm_term=0_ed5b384f14-5959f75965-589687121
